overview:
Founder and CEO of PE-Nexus, the leading deal flow exchange and social network for middle-market mergers & acquisitions professionals.

Prior to founding PE-Nexus, Anthony was a senior associate at Cross Keys Capital, a boutique investment bank which specialized in sell-side M&A advisory. During his tenure at Cross Keys, he developed sector expertise in aerospace & defense, Internet, and niche manufacturing. He also spearheaded Cross Keys Capital ‘s expansion into South America, establishing two satellite offices in Brazil (Sao Paulo and Fortaleza) and acting as deal team leader for its first two Brazilian engagements.

Before joining Cross Keys Capital, Anthony held financial analyst positions at Alienware (a subsidiary of Dell, Inc.) and Siemens Power Generation. At Siemens, Anthony was a member of the Alstom Integration Team, a multi-disciplinary team tasked with executing the integration of Siemens’ 1â‚¬ billion acquisition of Alstom’s industrial turbine division. As part of this effort, Anthony led financial technology integration projects in Russia, Brazil, India, England, Germany, and the United States.
